label: 閼伽桶
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Pail of holy water used in esoteric rites.  In large temples, a special well was often dug especially for the purpose of acquiring pure water.  In the case of the Latter Seven-Day, water from the pond at the imperial garden of Shinzen'en was used from at least  the 11th century on.
